name: Lotus Notes 4 Database
summary: Learn about .NS4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: "Domino," the Notes server program, was released in 1996 along with Notes 4.5. Many following updates were only released for Windows, but Lotus Notes 7.0.2 was released for Mac OS X in 2006.

description: Database file created by Lotus Notes 4.x; contains a list of contacts, text notes, e-mail messages, calendars, and other information; stores structured data for personal and business organizational management.
